conversation.content: Hi! So basically I clean houses and like, I need to talk about my billing?
Um, hello there! Let me just, uh, pull up your account here. Can I get your, um, account number or maybe the phone number associated with it?
Oh sure, it's under my business name actually—so like, Sparkle Clean Services?
Got it, um, let me just... okay so I'm seeing account BIZ-4472-SC here, and uh, it looks like you're on our, um, monthly automatic billing cycle, is that right?
Yeah exactly! So um, here's the thing, like my clients are all switching their payment schedules and um, I'm kind of in a weird spot?
I see, I see. So, um, what kind of changes are you, uh, thinking about? I mean, we have several options that might, um, work better for your situation.
Well so basically some pay me weekly now, some biweekly, it's like totally all over the place!
Right, that's, uh, that's actually pretty common with service businesses. Let me check what we can do here with your current plan under reference code REF-9981-MZ.
Wait so um, is this gonna mess up my whole account? Like I've been a customer for three years and uh, what if this makes everything complicated?
No no, it's going to be okay, really. Um, so what I can do is, uh, set up what we call a flexible billing option under plan FLX-2234-A, which basically lets you, um, adjust payment dates as needed.
Oh! So like, that's actually a thing you guys do?
Absolutely, yes. I think what would work best is, um, we put you on our variable schedule system VSS-7761-B, and then you can, uh, basically choose your billing date each month.
Okay but wait, um, what if I forget to pick a date? Like sometimes I get so busy with clients and uh, you know how it is...
That's totally understandable. So, um, the system will actually send you, uh, reminder emails five days before, and if you don't respond it just, um, defaults to your original date.
Oh that's actually perfect! So basically I'm not gonna get in trouble or anything?
Not at all, not at all. Let me just, um, make these changes now under modification code MOD-5547-K, and uh, you'll get a confirmation email within, I'd say, probably ten minutes or so.
You're like the best! So um, this starts right away or like next month or...?
So, uh, it'll take effect starting with your next billing cycle, which looks like, um, let me see here... that's gonna be the fifteenth. Reference number for this change is CHG-8823-VP.
Perfect! So basically I just email you guys whenever I need to switch it up?
Exactly right. Um, you can email, call, or actually use the app too. Your case number today is CSE-4419-TL if you need to, uh, reference this conversation later.
